headline: Is Colgate Palmolive (CL) Still Attractive After Its Strong Share Price Run In 2025
summary: If you are wondering whether Colgate-Palmolive's share price still offers value after a strong run, this article walks through what the current price could mean for long term investors. The stock last closed at US$95.65, with returns of 1.8% over 7 days, 13.2% over 30 days, 23.1% year to date, 13.4% over 1 year, 38.3% over 3 years and 38.9% over 5 years. Recent attention on Colgate-Palmolive has largely centered on its position as a global consumer staples brand and on how investors view the...
